resources.string:
"When magnification is turned on, use the Accessibility button at the bottom of the screen to quickly magnify.
"To zoom", tap the Accessibility button, then tap anywhere on the screen. "
"Drag 2 or more fingers to scroll "
Pinch 2 or more fingers to adjust zoom"
"To zoom temporarily", tap the Accessibility button, then touch & hold anywhere on the screen. "
"Drag to move around the screen "
Lift finger to zoom out"
You can’t zoom in on the keyboard or navigation bar."
Optimize brightness level for available light

"Your phone has been used more than usual. Your battery may run out sooner than expected.
Top %1$d apps you used since full charge:"
network, mobile network state, service state, signal strength, mobile network type, roaming, iccid
When your device is locked, how do you want notifications to show?

string.name: privacy_authorize_dialog_message
string.Data: "In order to use the basic features of this service, you must agree that Xiaomi will collect, process, and use your personal data. Refer to our Privacy Policy to learn how we collect and process personal data. Selecting \"Agree\" means that you've read and agreed to our Privacy Policy and User Agreement."

resources.string: Mi Account; Mi Account ID;Account;Account ID;Xiaomi Account;Account protection;Protect account;Account security;My account
Use %1$s instead of %2$s for mobile data?
To switch apps, swipe up on the Home button. Swipe up again to see all apps. Works from any screen. You’ll no longer have an Overview button on the bottom right of your screen.
Ask every time (unless turned on automatically)
Until you turn off (unless turned on automatically)
